column4: my 460gb partition formatted with xfs in about 2 seconds. is this right/normal? i expected it to take longer
presumably xfs just does a quick format to initialise an empty root directory and nothing else
i was able to make a file in it and read right to it
nothing i guess, if you can mount and read/write it and "df" shows the right amount of free space
still scary, was way to fast
